name: CleanWipe Usage
description: Detects the use of CleanWipe a tool usually used to delete Symantec antivirus.
false_positives: Legitimate administrative use (Should be investigated either way)
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Ss][Ee][Pp][Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Vv][Aa][Ll][Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Nn][Aa][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee]_[Xx]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Aa][Tt][Cc][Ll][Ee][Aa][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-\-[Uu][Nn][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Ll][Ll].*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Ll][Ll][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Rr].*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Ww][Ff][Pp][Uu][Nn][Ii][Nn][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Uu][Nn][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Ll][Ll].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Ee][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Pp][Rr][Ii][Ss][Ee].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\SepRemovalToolNative_x64.exe OR (process.executable:*\\CATClean.exe AND process.command_line:*\-\-uninstall*) OR (process.executable:*\\NetInstaller.exe AND process.command_line:*\-r*) OR (process.executable:*\\WFPUnins.exe AND process.command_line:*\/uninstall* AND process.command_line:*\/enterprise*))`
